overview: In this video, I’m trying to produce a writing stuck to reality and in dialogue with my « Inner space ». Writing as a subjective camera in order to create different portraits … Drill through poetry the singularity that I perceive in the banal and the exceptional. Let the videos be perception points of reality which are violent, touching, dirty and splendid at the same time. I have a kind of caustic tenderness for the world around me. I am fascinated by its filthy side and its deep beauty at the same time.
title: Capsules / Portraits
